aircraft.value: Hercules Transport - AC-5661-821 at Forward Operating Base-2

defect_observed.value: Pneumatic starter motor overheat. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Bleed Air System component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 18/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 20/11/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 21/11/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 23/11/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 24/11/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Pneumatic starter motor overheat. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Bleed Air System component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
